alert.note: Alert for Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:58PM CDT until June 17 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR EASTERN PICKENS COUNTY... At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Reform, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gordo, Reform, Carrollton, Owens, Kirk, Pioneer, North Pickens Airport and McShan. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
